modelDetails.description:
TMX 20 NEO is a smart machine promising high power, high fuel efficiency, and high durability. Ensuring best in class performance and low running cost. Equipped with a reliable and powerful Japanese engine, improved structures, superior hydraulic and electricals. TMX 20 neo is a powerful yet quiet mini excavator.

Specs:

Engine power: 27.4 HP
Operating Weight: 2300 KG
Bucket Capacity: 0.04 m³ - 0.07 m³

TMX 20 NEO - Engine:

Reliable and powerful Japanese Engine with class leading power and low noise.Long service intervals to reduce the maintenance cost.

TMX 20 NEO - Control Valve:

Reliable and powerful Japanese Engine with class leading power and low noise.Long service intervals to reduce the maintenance cost.

TMX 20 NEO - Swing Motor:

Reliable aggregates with low maintenance cost and longer life for best in class performance.
